ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappoints the HONOURABLE LOUISE ARBOUR, C.C., G.O.Q., of Montr√©al, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Advisory Panel to the Minister of National Defence on Defence Policy Review, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term beginning on February 1, 2017 and ending on April 28, 2017.
